page.title: 15CLUBS
page.content: The Goodwill Fund is a group of people who for several years have organised fundraising events in the village. On the first Saturday in September a large fete is held in the meadow next to the Chequers public house. Troughout the year the Goodwill Fund organises other events. All funds go to help the villages of Wrestlingworth, Tadlow, Eyeworth and Cockayne Hately. These are just some of the ways. Anyone ill receives a gift; any villager in hospital receives a gift; help is given with visiting the sick; the children receive a gift and Senior Citizens receive a parcel at Christmas time; donations are made to other deserving village causes.
